description: This file defines a mock class for testing CloudStore functionality, inheriting from multiple store-related interfaces and utilizing Google Mock for mocking methods.

classes.name: CloudStoreImplementationMock
classes.description: Mock class implementing multiple store interfaces for unit testing within the CloudStore component.

methods.name: ~CloudStoreImplementationMock
methods.description: Default destructor for the mock class.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the registration of notifications for IStore and IStore2 interfaces.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks the unregistration of notifications for IStore and IStore2 interfaces.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a key-value pair in a namespace or scope.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value given namespace/key or scope/namespace/key.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deletion of a specific key within a namespace or scope.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Mocks deletion of an entire namespace or scope.

methods.name: GetKeys
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of keys within a scope and namespace.

methods.name: GetNamespaces
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of namespace list within a scope.

methods.name: GetStorageSizes
methods.description: Mocks retrieving storage size information within a scope.

methods.name: GetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks obtaining storage limit for a namespace within a scope.

methods.name: SetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks setting storage limit for a namespace within a scope.
